column4: just googing and saw a mention that --> rTorrent 0.8.7 works fine with magnet links in terms of downloading.
oh... Google told me you needed to add a patch and recompile from source to enable it. Will look into it, thanks
all the patches i saw mentioned were 2+ yrs old.
also seen some mention of some sort of 'script' to convert magnet links to normal torrents.
